name: Carp-ocalypse
description:
Gameplay 🐟

Ever since you were a child, have you always dreamed of fishing for carps using dynamite and baseball bats? Wow man, it's your lucky day!
Hit carps, unlock different bats, score homeruns, shoot down airplanes, summon ancient gods and unleash the carpocalypse!

Developed with love by Carpe Team

No carp nor airplane were harmed in the making of this game.

Controls 🎮

wasd - move
space bar - jump
mouse movement + left click - swing your bat

Credits📜
